name: Broshniv-Osada town council of united territorial community of Ivano-Frankivsk region
goal: The main objective of the Broshniv-Osada town council of united territorial community of Ivano-Frankivsk region is creation a positive environment for the progressive social, economic and cultural development of the community through self-organization and other activities through involving and implementation of important projects.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Public Health, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
ENP Action Plan
Agreement between UN and the Government of Ukraine of 1992
